root.title: 10 Bichiktoo-Bum VIII
root.place: The inscription is in 1 km north to the inscription Bichiktoo-Bum III on south slope of the mountain, at 70 m high of mountain’s foot, over the inscription Bichiktoo-Bum VII.
root.general: Put on face of size 85 x 35 cm, facing to south. Consists of two vertical lines.
root.description: The left line includes 9 characters, the length of line 11,5 cm, the second line includes 27 characters, the length is 37,5 cm. Height of characters between 1,8-2,5 cm.
root.size: Сол жақтағы жолда 9 таңба бар, жол ұзындығы 11,5 см, екінші жол 27 таңбадан тұрады, ұзындығы 37,5 см. Таңбалардың биіктіші 1,8-2,5 см.
root.investigation: Found in 2001 by student Tarbanaev of Gorno-Altaisk State University. Kyzlasov, Nevskaya, Tybykova studied on place in 2003-2005. Publications Kocheev 523.

pdf.f_title: Свод древнетюркских рунических памятников Горного Алтая. Горно-Алтайск: АКИН, 2006. – 52 с.

refs.ref: Кызласов И.Л. Рунические письменности евразийских степей.-М. 1994.-С. 318.-Рис. 18.
